DIYPage.hero_title: Yes, You Can Do This Yourself
DIYPage.hero_subtitle: And we want to be honest with you about that.
DIYPage.hero_description: In an era where ChatGPT, Claude, and other AIs can generate functional code, we believe you deserve total transparency. Here's the truth about what you can do alone and where we really add value.
DIYPage.truth_title: The Truth About AI and Development
DIYPage.truth_intro: AI tools have democratized software development. Today you can:
truth_items: Generate functional code with ChatGPT, Claude, or Copilot
Build complete applications using Cursor, Bolt, or Replit
Create landing pages and websites without writing code
DIYPage.truth_conclusion: Many entrepreneurs are already building successful products this way. And that's okay.

cost_items.description: Weeks or months learning basic concepts of programming, architecture, and deployment.

cost_items.title: Trial and error
cost_items.description: Hours debugging errors that an experienced developer would solve in minutes.

cost_items.description: Architectural decisions that seem right today but cost dearly later.

cost_items.title: Your time has value
cost_items.description: Every hour you invest in code is an hour you don't invest in your business.

value_items.title: Experience that saves time

value_items.title: A complete team

value_items.title: Focus on your business
